name: The Rewinder (Break)
description:
'The Rewinder' is the full version of the game made for my first ever game jam,  made completely by me (except for the audiomanager). It is a grid based, turn based puzzle game with 10 levels where you can rewind the enemies by clicking on them! I know this game isn't perfect but feel free to give me advice, even just for this itch page and thanks for playing!

HOW TO PLAY [Explained in game]
  • You are the blue square
  • Click on the green squares around you to move
  • Walk into the goal (the yellow square) to finish the level
  • Press 'r' to restart the level
  • Enemies will instantly kill you if they hit you
  • Enemies can only walk up, down, left and right, but you can walk diagonally aswell
  • Click on enemies to rewind them if you have enough rewinds (shown at the top of the screen)
  • Walk onto buttons (small red squares) to open the gates
  • Enemies can also open gates

Tested on windows at 1920x1080
